propositions.text: Wind and smoke guide the narrative of historical and personal struggles in a borderland setting.
Ta爷 (Grandfather) reflects on life and legacy while facing inevitable decline.
The General embodies strength and unresolved inner conflict amidst societal expectations.
The concept of 'wind rising' symbolizes change and the beginning of significant events.
Interactions in the city highlight themes of power, gender, and personal identity.
Killing intent (杀气) recurs as a dominant emotional and thematic element.
Repetition of 'killing intent though heavy, yet not of our kind' suggests alienation and moral conflict.

concepts.name: Ta爷 (Grandfather)
concepts.context: A central figure reflecting on life, legacy, and inevitable decline in a borderland setting.

concepts.name: General
concepts.context: A powerful character with inner conflicts, embodying strength and societal expectations.

concepts.name: Killing Intent (杀气)
concepts.context: A recurring theme representing aggression, conflict, and emotional intensity.

concepts.name: Wind (风)
concepts.context: Symbolic of change, turmoil, and the beginning of significant events.

concepts.name: Jade Leaf (玉叶)
concepts.context: A mysterious object symbolizing heritage, danger, or destiny.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured into three chapters, each focusing on different characters and themes, with a heavy emphasis on dialogue and internal conflict, progressing from personal reflection to societal tension.
